title: Kim Satz on LinkedIn: Biden's Workplace Vaccine-or-Test Rule Halted by Fifth Circuit
author: Kim Satz
description: Biden's Workplace Vaccine-or-Test Rule Halted by Fifth Circuit
cleaned_text: of People and Opportunities for Mutually Beneficial and Rewarding Outcomes and Impact. [](https://www.linkedin.com/in/vianeibraunattorney?trk=public_post_reshare_feed-actor-image) Labor and Employment Shareholder at Decker Jones, P.C. Board Member, First Financial Bank Texas and Texas Health Resources The OSHA emergency temporary standard mandating COVID vaccination or testing for employees of larger (100+) employers has been stayed by the 5th Circuit. Never a dull moment these
